response.overview: “A Gifted Journey” is a documentary that follows a mother’s journey of raising her daughter, Zandy, who lives with cerebral palsy and microcephaly. The film highlights the struggles of a mother as she navigates the realities of raising her child with disability. It also gives a closer look into Zandy’s daily routine. The documentary explores the mother’s coping mechanisms for tasks that require patience, from everyday activities to consoling her child during difficult times. As the story unfolds, it shows the importance of support and the special bond between a mother and her child, allowing viewers to see the resilience, hope, and humanity that defines their journey.
response.title: A Gifted Journey
